traits.name: Amphibious
entries: Pharblex can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Poison Strike (3/Day)
entries: Once per turn, when Pharblex hits with a melee attack, he can expend a use of this trait to deal an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage.

traits.name: Standing Leap
entries: As part of his movement and without a running start, Pharblex can long jump up to 20 feet and high jump up to 10 feet.

traits.name: Swamp Camouflage
entries: Pharblex has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Pharblex attacks twice. Once with his bite and once with his spear.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spear
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +5 to hit. reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Pharblex is a 6th-level spellcaster that uses Wisdom as his spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). Pharblex has the following spells prepared from the druid spell list:
